id.description: The unique identifier of the group owner.

groupId.description: The unique identifier of the group the owner belongs to.

@odata.type.description: The object type being returned as per the OData protocol.

businessPhones.description: The list of business phone numbers associated with the group owner.

displayName.description: The display name of the group owner.

givenName.description: The given name (first name) of the group owner.

jobTitle.description: The job title of the group owner.

mail.description: The email address of the group owner.

mobilePhone.description: The mobile phone number of the group owner.

officeLocation.description: The office location of the group owner.

preferredLanguage.description: The preferred language of the group owner.

surname.description: The surname (last name) of the group owner.

userPrincipalName.description: The user principal name (login name) of the group owner.
